author: cms-btv-pog
body:
...mework and cleaning.

Complete transition to the new DQM framework of the Btag modules and cleaning of the code.

Few things which could be discussed:
- I was not able to to update properly this function due to my lack of knowledge with "boost:bind":
  https://github.com/acaudron/cmssw/compare/DQMHarvesterBTag#diff-9cad6096c5f7ae512cc862266f56a248L93
  this function for the moment is not doing anything but perhaps some day it will be used. For the moment I just commented it and  it's probably fine for now.
- I let thread_unsafe the following class:
  https://github.com/acaudron/cmssw/compare/DQMHarvesterBTag#diff-387724e025d75a5c1fc61796fd30b2f7L37
  but I don't define this new class as thread_unsafe:
  https://github.com/acaudron/cmssw/compare/DQMHarvesterBTag#diff-54c3cebbb4084fd4795f949811595b12R18
  Is it fine?

Thanks for the help.
title: Update BTag DQMOffline and Validation codes to match new ThreadedDQM fra...
